name: 410project
description: For my semeter project, I will build an aplication where a user can create an account, log on, play a sudoku game, and have their progress saved when they log out. Each game will be auto-generated with a relation to a level of difficulty. The puzzle will also be able to be reset if the user desires, and each completed puzzel will grant points to the user. When the user reaches a certain amout of points they will increase in level.
